website_summaries.verdict: Coming from the X series, the Adidas X 17.3 is a soccer cleat that is made for high-intensity and agile plays on firm grounds. With a Techfit compression upper that offers great comfort and an outsole that executes with impressive traction, it is no surprise why most players loved this shoe. This is also a reasonably priced soccer cleat.However, it is important to note that comfort was achieved after the break-in period for some of its users. Save for this, all is well for this good-looking shoe.
pros: According to most reviews, the Adidas X 17.3 Firm Ground is a great-looking soccer cleat
Some players found these firm ground cleats to be very comfortable
A good number of users mentioned that this cleat is durable and of good quality
At its price point, some buyers commented that this cleat is a definite bang for the buck
Several wearers were very satisfied with the snug fit and soft in-shoe feel of these Adidas cleats
Few testers said that the Adidas X 17.3 performed with a good grip on firm grounds
cons: A few reviewers noticed that the Adidas X 17.3 had a tight fit around the toe box area
Some testers complained of getting bruises over the foot upon trying out the cleat
To some players, the cleat needed some time to break in before they felt comfortable
According to several wearers, the cleat runs quite small and narrow

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 10 as I’m a size 10. Just got my foot into them. I recommend you order a larger size. Stunning togs, shame they don’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Small fitting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast but unfortunately very small fitting so had to be returned, so would advise going up a size from your usual brand of football boots
customer_reviews.author: rhys0812

customer_reviews.title: Top bin!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend and the first day he tried them out he scored 5 he high fives me and says leave a review saying "top bin"
customer_reviews.author: MutsNuts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boy they were bought for said they are 'Triffic. Comfy'
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit small fitting but my son loves these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great boots fits lovely and great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to being a UK 9. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to being a UK 9.5, they are a fair chunk smaller than all of my other size 9 Boots and Trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Broadhurst

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Great boots but I found the size to be slightly smaller than a usual size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Webster

customer_reviews.title: Small fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very tight on my foot to the point of being uncomfortable, wore them hoping the would stretch during the game but second half had to change boots.
customer_reviews.author: Derick keegan

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE SENT OUT...AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Footy boots were fab but 3 times I orderd a size 6 UK and 3 tyms I got a size 10.5 uk. Help is pants! It Costa me £5 everytime I send these back!!! Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: jillian scott

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Still look good after a football season and I wash them in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer no 12

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My son doubted the quality of the product as the price was so good, he’s every bit as pleased as I am.
customer_reviews.author: ali lyons

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a present for an uncle who found them to be stylish and of a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: The Inn

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved these boots .fitted well still going strong now
customer_reviews.author: Rubyruby

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but boots loosen after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: Colour was great a small bit tight but will loosen out after a few games
customer_reviews.author: Claire Dillon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way undersized, even compared to other adidas boots, let alone other brands.
customer_reviews.author: mark berry

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Mens X 17.3 FG Football Boots-Yellow
product_meta.description: The X 17.3 features a techfit upper which requires zero wear-in time, perfectly moulding to the natural shape of your foot. A speed skin exterior has been updated to create a smooth and sleek look.
feature_bullets: Fit tip-if in between sizes, for tight fit go one size down and for loose fit go one size up
Mesh upper is breathable and synthetic lining

specifications.Color: Multicolor Solar Yellow Legend Ink Legend Ink
